form.label: To file a complaint or report against another player, EMS, or Police Officer I will use the Report a Player form and will wait for the Staff to review it and will not DM the Server Owners about the matter.
The application can take up to 2 weeks to review - I will not contact any of the staff team regarding the application or it may be denied. By checking you accept and understand this statement.
